reviewText: This is a fantastic collection if you dont already own the individual animated films.  I dont have this exact product, but I do have ALL the movies that make it up.  The animation is fantastic, the story lines are great you will not be disappointed, assuming you ARE a Marvel Fan.  There are character surprises in Wolverine versus Hulk and Thor versus Hulk that I just loved, I have been a Marvel Fan my whole life.  I would recommend this product, 5 stars, buy it.  I hope they make a movie with the Scarlet Witch I just love her.
Title: N/A

reviewText: If you are a fan of marvel comics, animation, or the recent avengers live action film then this value priced set is right for you containing six of marvel animations features at a reasonable price. if you already have one or two of the dvd's contained it still might be cheaper than buying the other 4 separately.Both the ultimate avenger films are kinda short but excellent takes on the ultimate universe, Hulk Vs. has 2 shorts with slightly differing animation styles but has great fight scenes with hulk rampaging in asgard against thor and begrudingly teaming with wolverine against the weapon x program. NEXT Avengers is a cute and original take on avengers mythos featuring the children of the avengers in an ultron controlled future and the set is rounded out with the so so Dr. Strange and the sub par Iron Man. It gets 4 stars instead of 5 because of the last 2 films mentioned. If they re released the package with planet hulk and Thor Tales of Asgard instead it would be a 6 star.

reviewText: Hulk vs. Thor, Hulk vs. Wolverine, Avengers 1-3, origin of Dr. Strange and his first fight with Dormammu, origin of Iron Man and his fight with Mandarin and more. Hulk vs. Thor is worth the price of this collection alone! These ain't your daddies comics, fanboy! Veeiiollent!

reviewText: Although I have yet to watch the films in this set, I can confess to the fact of seeing a part of 'Next Avengers: Heroes of Tomorrow' at some point on one of the cartoon network channels that I have available with the service that I use.  What little I saw was pretty good.  If you are a marvel fan, like me since I most of the marvel books (like Iron Man: The ultimate guide to the armored superhero', both marvel encyclopedias, encyclopedias on the x-men and fantastic four to name a few) along with a few marvel films, get this set.

reviewText: This box set collects the first 6 animated films from the 'Marvel Animated Features' collection:Ultimate Avengers - The Movie,Ultimate Avengers 2 (Rise of the Panther),The Invincible Iron Man,Doctor Strange: The Sorcerer Supreme,The Next Avengers: Heroes of Tomorrow, andHulk Vs.. Note that these are exactly the same discs you would get if you bought the movies individually, right down to the shrink-wrapped packaging. The Hulk Vs disc is the single disc edition and not the 2-disc set which had a few more bonus features.As with all other similar collected box sets, the value you get ultimately depends on how many of these films you already own. If you're a die-hard Marvel fan, you probably bought most of these as they came out. But if you only own a few (say 1 or 2), this is a nice way to snag all the current releases in one go. Or as a gift to someone who hasn't checked these out yet.In all, Marvel's got a good slate here. Those interested in Iron Man and the Hulk will be glad to know they pop up quite frequently throughout the 6 films, while the Avengers get some decent exposure in anticipation of their forthcoming movie and a film for the lesser-known Doctor Strange is a pleasant surprise. The quality of the films ranges from good to excellent - the early entries run into the usual story, acting, and animation issues associated with direct-to-video releases, but Marvel seems to learn with every entry and the newest one (Hulk Vs) is particularly excellent. The films are PG to PG-13 and a little more adult than usual Saturday morning fare.A good gift set for the uninitiated. Looking forward to the next animated releases.
